en.about.title: About me
en.about.paragraph1: I am a developer and software architect with more than 10 years of experience building scalable digital products. For years I worked in fintechs, leading teams and optimizing complex systems.
en.about.paragraph2: But I am also deeply connected to art, culture and aesthetics. gemm-apps was born as a way to unite my two worlds: technology and the expressive side.
en.about.paragraph3: Today I develop apps with soul, for people and projects that have something to say. Because form also communicates, and a well-made app can be a cultural piece.
